title: Riot. Lunar Revel is now just an excuse to make money?
body: So it seems this year, there is not a single free reward from Lunar Revel. Disgusting.

replies.body: Riot is a company running a business, just incase you were unaware
Providing a great free to play, non pay to win game. I think that we are getting quite a good deal actually.

> free to play

My $900 says otherwise.
The new skins are good enough even if you need to pay for them man
